MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY8 postcode area of Leven. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3:09pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further investigations required on our underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:13pm on 5th December 2020.
